# Task Processor Auto Command

Process tasks autonomously with automated PR reviews and gap analysis after each PR creation/commit..

## Usage

```
/task-processor-auto
```

## What It Does

This command invokes the `task-processor-auto` skill. See the skill documentation for detailed process steps.

## Skill Reference

This command invokes: `@skills/task-processor-auto`

See `@skills/task-processor-auto/SKILL.md` for full documentation and `@skills/task-processor-auto/reference.md` for examples.
